banner: Continually Enhancing Value for Our Global Customers

services_we_offer.title: About Rishabh
services_we_offer.description: Rishabh Software was founded in the year 2000 by Mr. & Mrs. Raju Shah with a simple thought of delivering exceptional value to global customers. From the start, the vision was clear – to empower businesses with world-class software solutions. They did this by tapping into local talent in their home state of Gujarat by building a platform for budding software developers to grow and nurture their careers. At Rishabh, we not only provide your business with exceptional enterprise-grade applications but go above and beyond. With 1200+ successful projects and a process-driven mindset, we’ve got your back. Our repeat clientele speaks volumes for our values and ethics in all our dealings – be it software development across web, mobile, analytics, cloud, or through our engineering and BPO services. We believe in doing the best for our clients because WE CARE.

core_values: Our success is defined by our core values of commitment to clients, ethics and society through sustained collaboration, honesty and opportunity creation partnerships.
Specialized training programs for budding talent
Mentorship collaboration with major regional bodies

leadership_team.name: Raju Shah
leadership_team.title: Founder & Chief Executive Officer
leadership_team.bio: A serial entrepreneur and visionary, Mr. Shah has four decades of impeccable experience in setting the strategic direction for Rishabh.

leadership_team.name: Saumil Shah
leadership_team.title: Chief Strategy Officer
leadership_team.bio: Saumil Shah is at the forefront of the company’s digital journey. As a true strategic leader, this IIT-Kanpur & London Business School alumnus gets things done with efficiency and precision.

leadership_team.name: Srinivasa Challa
leadership_team.title: Chief Technology Officer
leadership_team.bio: CS steers the company’s forays by filling the gaps between technology and business. An ardent technologist, with 30+ years of experience in delivering technology solutions and creating IT strategies for large enterprises.

leadership_team.name: Balaji K S
leadership_team.title: SVP – People and Client Success
leadership_team.bio: Balaji’s role has been instrumental in Rishabh’s transformational journey, shaping its people, processes, and the organizational structure. With 22 years of human resource management experience, Balaji drives successful client engagements and people management initiatives.

leadership_team.name: Kandarp Shah
leadership_team.title: AVP - Technology (Microsoft Practice)
leadership_team.bio: Kandarp Shah has over 16+ years of experience with Microsoft technologies. He drives strategy and execution spanning all aspects of digital transformation and technology development for clients using the Microsoft ecosystem.

leadership_team.name: Bhardwaj Pandya
leadership_team.title: VP - Technology
leadership_team.bio: Bhardwaj Pandya constructs large scalable systems with a passion for open source technologies. Bringing over 19+ years of technology experience, he drives innovation across enterprise applications and architecture.

leadership_team.name: Suresh Patel
leadership_team.title: AVP - Technology (Digital Services Practice)
leadership_team.bio: Suresh Patel through his 18+ year professional journey has made a significant mark in achieving peak customer satisfaction through the successful delivery of digital services projects.

leadership_team.name: Prasanth Nair
leadership_team.title: AVP - Technology (Analytics Practice)
leadership_team.bio: Prasanth Nair is known for driving business transformation initiatives by leveraging analytics & data science to help solve real-world business problems. With 20+ years of experience, he leads data-centric innovation for client success.

leadership_team.name: Sapan Sehgal
leadership_team.title: VP - IT Operations
leadership_team.bio: Sapan Sehgal has close to 22 years of experience in establishing, leading, and managing quality across diverse geography projects, ensuring that business operations run smoothly and technology infrastructures are reliable and secure.
